GSD.product_version: versions from v5.18 to before v6.0.9
GSD.description:
bpf, sockmap: Fix the sk->sk_forward_alloc warning of sk_stream_kill_queues

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.9 by commit 14e8bc3bf7bd6af64d7538a0684c8238d96cdfd7, it was introduced in version v5.18 by commit 84472b436e760ba439e1969a9e3c5ae7c86de39d. For more details please see the references link.
